name: AllAboutBadBreath
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Bad breath, or halitosis, is a condition that is most often a source of embarrassment for the person affected. Yet, not many people with bad breath are even aware that they have this problem. So how do you know if you have this problem? A person can’t be expected to know right away that they have this problem. However, there are certain factors that may cause bad breath. To find out more , enable our skill , and learn all about Bad Breath and how to fix it , in short daily flashes. The information in this skill is provided for informational and educational purposes only.
